extendedInfo.description: Puzzle games, logic puzzles, brain teasers, visual puzzles, IQ quizzes, intelligence games, IQ tests, logic quizzes - whatever you call them, fun is what this puzzle game is all about. If you like fun logic games, then these puzzles are for you! Puzzlers! is a 50-level puzzle game. One of the best rated games, best rated apps, top puzzle games and best games of 2010!In this addicting puzzle game, each level consists of a unique puzzle that you must solve to get to the next level. Levels get more and more difficult the further you get. Be warned - your IQ will be tested! Puzzles include ciphers, cryptograms, tile puzzles, number sequences, mazes, classic riddles, classic logic problems, and tons of original, unique puzzles!There are some hard brain teasers in this puzzle app, so we've added a hint system to help your puny human brain. Compete with friends and see who can beat all the IQ puzzles in the fewest number of hints.
